divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed a glowing red star like object , what i thought was a planet was moving slowly from the west to the north at a steady but slow speed at first , just when i thought i lost view it became more visible as if it back tract a little then stayed motionless for 5 to 7 minutes, then headed north again slowly until visual contact was lost.
Summary: slow moving red star/planet like light , very bright moving west to north hovering still for ten minutes then head north out of view
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Marion
There were no other sightings in Marion on or around March 20th 2012
